mapper.insert: insert into board (book_num, boardnum, m_id, board_title, board_content, inputdate, board_hits) values( #{booknum},board_seq.nextval,#{id},#{board_title},#{board_content},default,default )
mapper.select: select * from board where book_num = #{book_num} order by boardnum desc
mapper.delete: delete from board where boardnum=#{boardnum} and book_num=#{book_num}
mapper.update: update board set BOARD_CONTENT= #{content} where boardnum=#{boardnum} and book_num=#{book_num}
